html:
{%- if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif -%}

Revenue Money Receipt

{{doc.name}} ཆང་སྤགས་ཨེ་རྫས་ཀྱིས་བཏུབ་པས།

Date: {{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.posting_date,"MM/dd/YYYY")}}



Agency {{doc.company}} Recieved from {{doc.recd_from}} Nu. {{doc.amount_received}} ({{ (frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.amount_received))[3:] }}) by Cash/Cheque/Cash Warrant/Demand Draft dated {{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.posting_date,"MM/dd/YYYY")}} towards the following accounts


{%- for row in frappe.get_list(doctype="GL Entry",fields = ["account", "party_type", "party", "debit", "credit"],filters = {"voucher_no":doc.name},order_by = "-debit") -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sl.No. Account Amount(Debit) Amount(Credit)
{{ loop.index }} {{ row.account }} {{ frappe.format_value(row.debit, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}, currency=doc.currency) }} {{ frappe.format_value(row.credit, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}, currency=doc.currency) }}

Total: {{doc.amount_received}}







Name-Designation & Office Seal

(Signature)
Accounts Officer

Printed by {{ frappe.user }} on {{ frappe.utils.nowdate() }} at {{ frappe.utils.nowtime() }}
{% if not no_letterhead and footer %}
{{ footer }}
{% endif %}

{{ _("Page {0} of {1}").format('', '') }}
name: Money Receipts(RP)
